infoArray.name: selectedBankId
infoArray.desc: Determines the bank that is currently selected.

infoArray.name: selectedCityId
infoArray.desc: Determines the city that is currently selected.

infoArray.name: selectedBranchId
infoArray.desc: Determines the branch that is currently selected.

infoArray.name: isClosedBanksInclude
infoArray.desc: Determines the closed or not closed banks.

infoArray.name: behaviourType
infoArray.desc: Bileşendeki hangi listelerin açık olacağını belirler. Mevcut seçenekler: Behaviour.Bank, Behaviour.BankCity, Behaviour.BankBranch, Behaviour.BankCityBranch

infoArray.name: onBankSelect
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the bank has been selected.

infoArray.name: onCitySelect
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the city has been selected.

infoArray.name: onBranchSelect
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the branch has been selected.
